instructions:
**Wrath & Glory (Advanced API)**

This is a multi-purpose sheet for both characters (default view) and threats based on the quickstart rules (subject to change).  **Advanced API**

This Wrath & Glory character sheet provides automated dice rolls using the Roll20 Inline dice rolling and integration with a Wrath and Glory API Dice Roller. If you have any questions, comments, or feedback (all welcome) please contact Barry at btsnyder@gmail.com
